channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Informix Dynamic Server Enterprise Edition
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Informix Dynamic Server Enterprise Edition

item.title: CVE-2018-1634|2024-08-05T04:07:44.166Z -- ibm -- informix%20dynamic%20server%20enterprise%20edition
item.description: IBM Informix Dynamic Server Enterprise Edition 12.1 could allow a local user logged in with database administrator user to gain root privileges through a symbolic link vulnerability in infos.DBSERVERNAME. IBM X-Force ID: 144437.

item.title: CVE-2018-1796|2024-08-05T04:14:38.583Z -- ibm -- informix%20dynamic%20server%20enterprise%20edition
item.description: IBM Informix Dynamic Server Enterprise Edition 12.1 could allow a local user to load malicious libraries and gain root privileges. IBM X-Force ID: 149426.

item.title: CVE-2018-1630|2024-08-05T04:07:44.146Z -- ibm -- informix%20dynamic%20server%20enterprise%20edition
item.description: IBM Informix Dynamic Server Enterprise Edition 12.1 could allow a local user logged in with database administrator user to gain root privileges through a symbolic link vulnerability in onmode. IBM X-Force ID: 144430.

item.title: CVE-2018-1631|2024-08-05T04:07:44.089Z -- ibm -- informix%20dynamic%20server%20enterprise%20edition
item.description: IBM Informix Dynamic Server Enterprise Edition 12.1 could allow a local user logged in with database administrator user to gain root privileges through a symbolic link vulnerability in oninit mongohash. IBM X-Force ID: 144431.

item.title: CVE-2018-1636|2024-08-05T04:07:44.016Z -- ibm -- informix%20dynamic%20server%20enterprise%20edition
item.description: Stack-based buffer overflow in oninit in IBM Informix Dynamic Server Enterprise Edition 12.1 allows an authenticated user to execute predefined code with root privileges, such as escalating to a root shell. IBM X-Force ID: 144441.

item.title: CVE-2018-1632|2024-08-05T04:07:44.066Z -- ibm -- informix%20dynamic%20server%20enterprise%20edition
item.description: IBM Informix Dynamic Server Enterprise Edition 12.1 could allow a local user logged in with database administrator user to gain root privileges through a symbolic link vulnerability in .infxdirs. IBM X-Force ID: 144432.

item.title: CVE-2018-1633|2024-08-05T04:07:44.119Z -- ibm -- informix%20dynamic%20server%20enterprise%20edition
item.description: IBM Informix Dynamic Server Enterprise Edition 12.1 could allow a local user logged in with database administrator user to gain root privileges through a symbolic link vulnerability in onsrvapd. IBM X-Force ID: 144434.

item.title: CVE-2018-1635|2024-08-05T04:07:44.198Z -- ibm -- informix%20dynamic%20server%20enterprise%20edition
item.description: Stack-based buffer overflow in oninit in IBM Informix Dynamic Server Enterprise Edition 12.1 allows an authenticated user to execute predefined code with root privileges, such as escalating to a root shell. IBM X-Force ID: 144439.
